mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_TX_P110DAT ( JNL_NO, CATEGORY_PURPOSE, ACCT_VERF, SETTLEMENT_CUR, SETTLEMENT_AMT, SETTLEMENT_DATE, INSTRUCTED_CUR, INSTRUCTED_AMT, CHG_AGT_ID, CHG_AGT_BIC, CHG_CUR, CHG_AMT, DEBTOR_NAME, DEBTOR_ORGID_ANYBIC, DEBTOR_ORGID_OTHRID, DEBTOR_ORGID_OTHRID_SCHMENM, DEBTOR_ORGID_OTHR_ISSR, DEBTOR_PRVTID_OTHRID, DEBTOR_PRVTID_OTHRID_SCHMENM, DEBTOR_PRVTID_OTHR_ISSR, DEBTOR_CONT_PHONE, DEBTOR_CONT_EMADDR, DEBTOR_ACCTNO, DEBTOR_ACCTNO_TYPE, DEBTOR_AGT_ID, DEBTOR_AGT_BIC, CREDITOR_NAME, CREDITOR_ORGID_ANYBIC, CREDITOR_ORGID_OTHRID, CREDITOR_ORGID_OTHRID_SCHMENM, CREDITOR_ORGID_OTHR_ISSR, CREDITOR_PRVTID_OTHRID, CREDITOR_PRVTID_OTHRID_SCHMENM, CREDITOR_PRVTID_OTHR_ISSR, CREDITOR_CONT_PHONE, CREDITOR_CONT_EMADDR, CREDITOR_ACCTNO, CREDITOR_ACCTNO_TYPE, CREDITOR_AGT_ID, CREDITOR_AGT_BIC, PURPOSE_TYPE, PURPOSE_CODE, PURPOSE_OTHER, REMIT_INFO, SRVC_MODE ) VALUES ( #{jnlNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pymtCatPrps, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{accountVerification, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{settlementCurrency, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{settlementAmount, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{settlementDate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{instructedCurrency, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{instructedAmount, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chargersAgentId, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{chargersAgentBic, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chargersCurrency, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chargersAmount, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{debtorName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{debtorOrgIdAnyBIC, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{debtorOrgIdOthrId, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{debtorOrgIdOthrIdSchmeNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{debtorOrgIdOthrIssr, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{debtorPrvtIdOthrId, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{debtorPrvtIdOthrIdSchmeNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{debtorPrvtIdOthrIssr, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{debtorContPhone, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{debtorContEmailAddr, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{debtorAccountNumber, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{debtorAccountNumberType, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{debtorAgentId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{debtorAgentBic, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creditorName, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{creditorOrgIdAnyBIC, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creditorOrgIdOthrId, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{creditorOrgIdOthrIdSchmeNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creditorOrgIdOthrIssr, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creditorPrvtIdOthrId, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{creditorPrvtIdOthrIdSchmeNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creditorPrvtIdOthrIssr, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creditorContPhone, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{creditorContEmailAddr, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creditorAccountNumber, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creditorAccountNumberType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creditorAgentId, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{creditorAgentBic, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paymentPurposeType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paymentPurposeCd, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{paymentPurposeProprietary, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remittanceInformation, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{srvcMode, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM TB_TX_P110DAT A WHERE A.JNL_NO = #{jnlNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT JNL_NO FROM TB_TX_P110DAT A WHERE A.SRC_REF_NM = #{SrcRefNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT A.JNL_NO FROM tb_tx_jnlaction A WHERE A.MSG_ID = #{MsgId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
